attributes.action: Allow vaccinated Britons to enter the UK without paid-testing and isolation
attributes.additional_details:
Her Majesty’s Government should consider how isolated, measures such as this, can make an individual and many families across the UK feel. 

It is absolutely paramount that parliament considers how they will honour vaccines that are administered outside of British territory, in order to safeguard ex-pats’ rights throughout the ongoing Covid-19 pandemic.
attributes.background:
We want Her Majesty’s government to commit to recognising British nationals living abroad as fully-vaccinated.

Parliament should also consider removing paid-testing, as it discriminates heavily against those who cannot afford to return home.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Allow ALL vaccinated British Expats to visit the UK without quarantining: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585438

Scrap quarantine for vaccinated people arriving in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575612

Exempt vaccinated people from PCR test requirement when travelling to England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586189
